Review from Holly Lang (5‚òÖ):
"My husband and I live in a small 780 sq foot cottage in Sault Ste Marie and had been looking at different fireplaces here in the area for a year. All were trying to sell us high end huge fireplaces but my husband and I thought that those would be too much heat for us for this little place.
I went to Ottawa for a couple of weeks and stopped in at Hubert's to have a look at their beautiful new showroom to see what types of fireplaces they would have. The showroom was so warm,  inviting and each fireplace was set up as if you were in a room. I could actally visualize what it would be like in our cottage. I saw one that I thought would be perfect and after speaking with Jodie and Kim who were incredibly knowledgeable I knew I had found the perfect one. It was just the right size and BTU'S for our little piece of heaven on Lake Superior.
Jodie made it all happen for us. A month later my husband drove to Ottawa and they loaded up the well packaged and secured the unit onto his pickup and sent a very happy husband on his way.
We couldn't be happier and grateful to the staff at Hubert's for helping us make it all happen and keeping us warm this winter up in the Great White North.

Thank you Jodie, Kim, Rob and Kyle

Holly and Hal and the Pupperonies"

Review from Michael Schulman (1‚òÖ):
"A corner of my house was sinking and water was coming in though a crack in another wall. Ground works came out and put in piers to secure the corner and filled the crack. Sadly when they first arrived they demoed the wrong wall, and fortunately gave me a credit for it. They also filled my radon pipe with concrete, and when I called the Forman he yelled at me and came to my house and pointed his finger in my face while yelling and then never did anything. I had to pay for a whole new system.

Two years later, water came back though the sealed crack and the corner they secured sank again. I called several times and finally they sent someone out. He took several measurements and said he would get back to me in two weeks. He never did. I contacted him and never heard back, then I contacted the company twice, they said someone would get back to me and again silence."

Review from Avi Yampolsky (1‚òÖ):
"DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!
Horrible, horrible experience! We specifically booked them to do a deep cleaning of an apartment before moving in. We have a great cleaning lady, but wanted a problem deep cleaning and was promised that this would be the case. First, we scheduled for 9am and clarified that we are pressed for time and will have to leave the place at 9:15 - they showed up a half hour late and had to reschedule. Then, a single lady showed up with a brook and windex in her backpack. That's it! I was shocked! I called the company, explained that this was not the agreement and insisted that she arrive with proper equipment and detergents. They promised they will send someone with a vacuum and more detergents. 30m later, they called and cancelled the whole thing.
I booked this week in advance and am now stuck with no option and have to go do the cleaning myself."

Review from Linda Van Doorn (1‚òÖ):
"These people were hired to clean and inspect a fireplace in a home that we were selling  The man SAID he inspected it and cleaned it.  He called me later that day and told me we needed a new fireplace that would cost $7,000 to $12,000.  My realtor sent several emails asking for a report.  No report was ever sent.  One day before the sale, my realtor found an honest fireplace company who inspected it, cleaned it, and sent us a report within a few hours.  Fireplace Doctor never touched it because the only problem the fireplace had were leaves and a bird nest in the vent/flu.  Buyer Beware!  The sale of the house happened, thank goodness,  only because of the honest people at the other company!  I would love to recommend this other company on here, but I shouldn't do so now."

Review from Dennis Whitehead (5‚òÖ):
"Our plumber Tom, with Plumbing Solutions, quickly found and repaired a water leak in our crawlspace.  He referred us to Standard Restoration as there was standing water from the leak that could cause mold.  Drew, with Standard Restoration, came by right away and investigated, describing the extent of the water damage and mold that was already appearing.  He quoted the cost, which was reasonable, and it included water removal and mold mitigation.  Shortly thereafter, Caleb came over and installed equipment to remove the water and isolate the mold.  He explained what he was doing, and did an excellent job.  My wife and I appreciated his great help!"

Review from Jules (5‚òÖ):
"We recently had our eavestroughs replaced with Gerry's. The quote and pricing we received could not be beat! Very satisfied with the job that was done. Rob was very helpful in providing a quote and answering our questions. The only criticism I could offer is I wish there was some more communication, as material had to be reordered when the initial colour didn't match. We had put down a deposit in March and the job wasn't completed until mid summer. From the time that we realized the colour didn't match, to waiting for the new material to arrive, we didn't hear anything for a few months until I personally reached out and asked for an update. I understand there was some change over in their customer service department, so I know blips happen! It's possible we just got lost in the shuffle. Overall we are satisfied and would recommend Gerry's to anyone needing their services."

Review from J 26 (5‚òÖ):
"I was first sold on the idea of getting a salt water spa from Caldera after owning a traditional spa for fifteen years. The salt water alternative seemed like a great idea. However, after doing some research, I came to the conclusion that salt water wasn‚Äôt all it was cracked up to be. You burn through way more cartridges than the sell you on, which drives the cost way high, and the salt residue around the spa isn‚Äôt so good for your concrete and landscaping. In the end the salt water tub just turns the salt intro chlorine anyway. So I walked into Spa Brokers and met with Brent. Brent was very transparent and helpful and I could tell that he was giving me the best deal possible. I ended up buying a Marquis Vector 94l. Due to Covid, it took a while to be delivered, but it was worth the wait. One of the jets had a flaw from the factory, and I was missing some brackets, however Brent and Phaedra replaced the jet and bracket without question and the delivery and set up was simple and easy. Spa brokers also gives you a complete starter kit. Brent even worked with me when I wanted to swap out the expensive boomerang lifter with a under mount side open cover lifter. Go see Brent, you won‚Äôt be disappointed."

Review from Dean Anderson (5‚òÖ):
"My wife and I approached Idaho Fireplace and Chimney to perform some tuck-pointing and repairs to our existing chimney, which included replacing several missing and damaged bricks, adding a precast concrete cap, a nice stainless steel vent, and some sealer to finish the work off.  We primarily interfaced with Ritchie who was very professional and responsive. He provided a great run down of options we had and price points for each of them to allow us to basically add to the scope as we felt was appropriate. I asked many questions to clarify the scope and to understand why and when and where something was needed, and Ritchie was patient, detailed, and honest in his answers and was never dismissive or evasive. His team showed up on time and the work turned out great and exceeded our expectations. They even generously caulked the concerning gaps at the flashing around the chimney base for free, to hold it over until a roof replacement in the spring. We will absolutely work with Ritchie and the others at Idaho Fireplace and Chimney again for any future projects!

Project Cost (only an estimate for those reading this) = $1430.00 (1 day)"

Review from NLM Services and Solutions (1‚òÖ):
"I just wanted to share to everyone my story. I was going to wait until the roof was paid off before doing this but I felt everyone should know. I was quoted $46,000 I trusted them from cambridge all good.

They took on my second home in drumbo my home leaked all through Christmas after they did some of the roof, I called and complained. They kept coming at night, I have no idea why I told them come in daylight. I had they're guy assuming I poured water down the roof vent, I was insulted. It was a rainy wet winter. I told them I wanted it done by October we were in January.

Then they're guy who probably was smoking too much pot said they're isn't anything they can see. I started renovating underneath in the home to find out I had paid for the trusses to be repaired if there was damage. I had a few collapsed in my attic. I fixed what I could. They're big boss frank gave me a call and said it's fine, I told him save his trip I'll send pictures. Then he gave me $1000 prepaid visa cards. I'm not stupid You'll write them off.

Then when it came to finishing the roof they took the pot smoker off and gave me Carlos. The goofs put up the wrong colour drip edge, told me they'd fix it later. By May I settled with just painting it so I didn't have to see them.  Let's not forget when they're employee fell through my ceiling on my bed. I didn't see any ropes, wonder what the ministry would say about this. The roof still leaks every now and then. They never answered us after the last leak. I'm just gonna shovel the snow off the roof. Incompetent roofers, my 14 year old son knows more.

To top it off, I feel they're payment plan was poorly explained and I think everyone should know. I told them they're preying on people old ladies, elderly and I didn't respect it. I pay 585/month. It's term is 60 months, they make it sound like it'll be done in 60 but no it's done in 180 months. That's 15 years. By then you've paid for it twice and some.

No wonder they can afford they're guy that just drives around and fixes things. Despicable company, shameful and frankly disgusting.  Once I pay this off, I hope I never see them again. I'm in business and understand the need to make money but can't respect outright lying and taking advantage of people and situations."
